title: Cayor Capital
description:
Cayor Capital launched in 2015, as a Sub-Saharan Africa equity fund, focusing on mid-market assets and investments. Upon reaching their investment goal, Cayor required a website update. I worked with the Cayor team to design and develop and maintain thier new, responsive single page app to attract future investments.
 My approach to Cayor was to advocate for a fresh, updated interface that put the investors and portfolio companies first. To make the site user-friendly, we focused on breathing life into the Company decks and transforming the details into designed pages.

title: Aeroasis Education Platform
description: Aeroasis is a resource autonomy startup with a focus on education. I developed an education curricula and created a platform for teachers and educators to access and interact with it.

title: Aeroasis
description: I have assisted in the development of the Aeroasis Website, which led to a 200% increase in visitor traffic and improved company SEO. Created and maintain company shop through Shopify, paypal, and Square.

title: Aeroasis Mobile App
description: Aeroasis Grow App: an IoT connected mobile user app.
